data.description:
Wizard‚Äôs Legacy blends VR immersion with roguelite replayability, offering action, adventure, and fantasy. Play as a powerful wizard, explore dynamic dungeons, face formidable foes, and uncover ancient secrets. Become the wizard you were meant to be.

![{"height":200,"type":"image","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974531_3648923575359874_6045762882849337953_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=M0XfIWAWZ_AQ7kNvgE3psNw&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCSqOaddN7_-loOjFXhxuKE39M96Ww7dU5tfYfLb4VoMg&oe=66E18E95)
A desperate father, bound by a dark pact, transforms into a wizard trapped within a cursed labyrinth. Each victory grants power, but death returns him to the start. Explore the labyrinth's ever-changing depths, where every battle unveils its grim history. Can you master magic, overcome enemies, and save your child?

{362183290313011}

![{"height":200,"type":"image","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75210890_459743686690446_3501885262078530070_n.png?_nc_cat=107&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=F9pHHohbTXAQ7kNvgESx91q&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCPwfNCUuW3pO4YktZFjdDaEYo52tKT3RxNcKAyI9eBUQ&oe=66E15EB6)
Dive deeper, shaping the world with every decision. Explore branching paths, unearth secrets, and face escalating challenges. Collect potions and power-ups scattered throughout to enhance your magic and forge your destiny as a powerful wizard.

![{"height":200,"type":"image","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035334_828863476009529_4855509097699660234_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=Te136bvnjJAQ7kNvgFB1Gkp&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDFe2uuJU9l7_8nTvehTEfKMSPlmeWf3mLBCKLULSI9aw&oe=66E1775B)
Unleash your inner wizard! Draw symbols to control fireballs, ice walls, and lightning. Feel the power surge as you master arcane combat.

{1407283433268429}

![{"height":200,"type":"image","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75451788_1453454965434216_5976306296474444737_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=cIqpv0NMWvEQ7kNvgFtkRan&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYB8fLI_ApNLG56KIUzkb7fo2Z9FmV2WzSvHhP9iytD35w&oe=66E184BB)
Choose from a variety of playable characters, each with unique spells and abilities. Experiment with different playstyles ‚Äì fiery mage, cunning illusionist, or something else entirely?

![{"height":200,"type":"image","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003240_1136617720726009_274065486154562011_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=qQrg9HVjLZcQ7kNvgElmi6E&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBkJ9_t0ZRP9cg6I6VKwLNgNjUCZT7zlUftKflpIk7jGQ&oe=66E16B31)
The labyrinth teems with cunning foes, each demanding a unique strategy. Test your skills against a diverse array of enemies, adapting tactics to exploit weaknesses and emerge victorious.

{788110426812574}

![{"height":200,"type":"image","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39001676_1584321832140100_3156697170318755428_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=WSlOTD9L4OMQ7kNvgEerRwA&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBYGlWhYPntEkLcJzl2EXCimUq9ttz1fGiLItn-VoO--Q&oe=66E17CE6)
Immerse yourself in stunning visuals. Explore dynamic dungeons, lush forests, and ominous landscapes, each meticulously detailed for an unforgettable VR experience.


{1415112652482029}

changelog.change_log:
Visual Enhancements

-Spell Rune Clarity: Spell runes now have distinct hover visual effects to easily differentiate between attack (red), utility (blue), and ultimate (yellow) spells.
-Borazan Visual Upgrade: Borazan's slash effects have been enhanced with improved visuals for a more impactful look.
-Frost Effect Fix: A visual glitch with the frost status effect on enemies has been resolved for Quest 2 and Quest Pro users.
-Rune Size Increase: Spell runes have been enlarged for better visibility.
-Lobby and Shop Improvements: Locked characters and NPCs in the lobby and shops now have a darker appearance for better distinction.
-Boss Health Bars: Boss health bars have been updated with unique designs for each boss and are now always visible.

Gameplay Improvements

-Gesture Drawing: Added sound effects (SFX) and haptic feedback for gesture drawing.
-Warding Shield SFX: Fixed issues with Warding Shield SFX playing incorrectly.
-Orange Movement: Fixed an issue with Orange's movement behaviour.
-Tarkhan Tutorial: Removed the blue screen that occurred after dying and going to the Tarkhan tutorial.
-Character Consistency: Fixed inconsistencies between Clockwork OranJ and GrumpyuChickenHead.
-Shop UI: Added spell levels to the shop UI for better information.
-Enemy Spawning: Fixed an issue that could cause enemies to fall through the environment in the Father tutorial.

Hello Wizards! üßô‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è‚ú®
We have just released our first Hotfix Patch for Wizard's Legacy! Firstly, thanks to everyone who bought the game on release day and everyone for their valuable feedback. The major change was improving our gesture recognition algorithm to make it feel much more consistent.

If you encounter a bug during your gameplay, please report it to our discord.

Bug Fixes

-Gesture recognition algorithm improved, highly increasing accuracy and consistency.
-UI pointer appear bug fixed.
-Lightning bolt wall hanging issue fixed.
-Stage 2 boss scene enemy AI navigation issue fixed.
-More detailed information about spell usage has been added to the spell description UIs.
-HexOCura book perk UI bug fixed.
-Fixed the issue with the spell gesture trail staying open between scenes.
-Adding functionality to Vespera NPC in shops.
-Moved the player's pockets closer to body to decrease chance of accidently picking up items up.
-Attack/Combo spells no longer leave the combo phase after shooting or after short time.
-Attack/Combo spells are limited to 5 shots/usages per cast.
-Lobby chest no longer closes after picking up a rune in pocket.
-Removed "Vampire Teeth" perk until further notice.
